entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind south 20 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
